EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at DevOpsDays Amsterdam
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for joining Pivotal at DevOpsDays Amsterdam 2016. We hope you enjoyed hearing how Pivotal is helping nearly a third of Fortune 100 companies become Software Defined Businesses, migrate to a Cloud Native model, and establish a DevOps culture in their IT organisation.
Get Free Cloud Hosting You can also sign up for 2 months of FREE Pivotal Web Services <[[http://try.run.pivotal.io/DevOpsDaysAMS?utm_source=landingpage&utm_medium=langingpagetext&utm_term=FreePWS&utm_campaign=DevOpsDaysAMS]]>, which will let you check out Pivotal Cloud Foundry without having to install and manage it yourself.
Download Matt Stine's Microservices eBook If you didn't get one from us at the conference, you can get a free, digital copy of Matt Stine's book on Cloud Native applications <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures-ebook?utm_source=landingpage&utm_medium=langingpagetext&utm_term=StineBook&utm_campaign=DevOpsDaysAMS]]> to learn how to architect and write Cloud Native applications, as well as understand how to deploy and manage them.
Hungry for More DevOps Resources? Coté and Andrew Shafer talk about DevOps <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal/features/devops-you-keep-using-that-word-what-is-devops-a-discussion-and-history]]> in one of our recent Pivotal Conversations podcasts. Planning for success with cloud and DevOps <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/news/how-to-write-about-paas-and-devops-without-once-typing-paas]]>, which also covers how we think cloud platforms can help. Staffing and organizing for DevOps success <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/news/organizing-for-devops-success]]>: how do you organize your IT department to be successful with DevOps?
Don’t forget to register for the Pivotal User Conference SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]>. Checkout the list of impressive speakers <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/presenters]]> we have lined up for you. This is the Pivotal event you don’t want to miss!
Kind regards, Ines Schuller | Account Executive EMEA ischuller@pivotal.io | +44 7769 324 503 Follow Us: Twitter <[[http://www.twitter.com/Pivotal]]> | LinkedIn <[[http://www.linkedin.com/company/pivotalsoftware]]> | Facebook <[[http://www.facebook.com/pivotalsoftware]]> | YouTube <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/goPivotal]]>
